title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - How Samsung Uses AI Agents to Optimize Infrastructure at Scale (AIM238)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 三星如何使用AI代理大规模优化基础设施 (AIM238)
abstract: Samsung operates a massive Kubernetes environment on Amazon EKS, using Cast AI across CPU and GPU workloads for unified infrastructure optimization. Samsung engineers reveal how they deployed AI agents that continuously optimize cloud infrastructure in real time. Beyond Spot Instance savings, Cast AI's binpacking optimization delivers remarkable efficiency gains. Combined with AI-driven automation, Samsung has significantly reduced operational overhead, improved application efficiency, and lowered costs across thousands of workloads. This session offers an inside look at how one of the world's most innovative companies uses AI to make Kubernetes smarter, faster, and more efficient. This presentation is brought to you by Cast AI, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 三星在 Amazon EKS 上运营着大规模的 Kubernetes 环境，使用 Cast AI 对 CPU 和 GPU 工作负载进行统一的基础设施优化。三星工程师展示了他们如何部署能够实时持续优化云基础设施的 AI 代理。除了 Spot 实例节省之外，Cast AI 的装箱优化还带来了显著的效率提升。结合 AI 驱动的自动化，三星大幅降低了运营开销，提高了应用程序效率，并降低了数千个工作负载的成本。本次会议深入介绍了全球最具创新力的公司之一如何使用 AI 让 Kubernetes 更智能、更快速、更高效。本演讲由 AWS 合作伙伴 Cast AI 提供。
